entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
